articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Gianni Infantino hits out at European critics of Qatar World Cup, calls out double standards - ABC News
articles.description: FIFA boss Gianni Infantino told reporters that Qatar would host the "best World Cup ever" during a speech in which he said he felt "Arab", "African" and "gay".
articles.content:
FIFA president Gianni Infantino targeted European critics of World Cup host Qatar on Saturday and suggested a moral double standard in his home continent.
Key points:

articles.author: James Olley
articles.title: World Cup: FIFA president Infantino slams Europe's hypocrisy in speech - ESPN
articles.description: FIFA president Gianni Infantino has lashed out at what he described as "hypocrisy" and "racism" from countries moralising about the Qatar World Cup.
articles.content: FIFA president Gianni Infantino has lashed out at what he described as "hypocrisy" and "racism" from countries moralising about the Qatar World Cup and claimed Europe should "apologise for the next 3… [+7482 chars]

articles.title: 'Back to the moon and beyond' – Irish company is helping to put first European on lunar surface - Independent.ie

articles.content:
An Irish company is helping put the first European on the moon in 2025.
